selectedVerses.text: Laban had gone to shear his sheep, and Rachel stole her father's household gods.
And when Tamar was told, "Your father-in-law is going up to Timnah to shear his sheep,"
"All the firstborn males that are born of your herd and flock you shall dedicate to the LORD your God. You shall do no work with the firstborn of your herd, nor shear the firstborn of your flock.
And the LORD said to Isaiah, "Go out to meet Ahaz, you and Shear-jashub your son, at the end of the conduit of the upper pool on the highway to the Washer's Field.
